org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config

Class BaseConfigVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.config.BaseConfigVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigVariable, RepeatableConfigVariable

    public abstract class BaseConfigVariable
extends Object
implements IOptionSource
    Provides a base class for ConfigVariable and RepeatableConfigVariable. This abstract class encapsulates all of the functionality that any ConfigVariable must have that does not involve "setting" it. Consumers of this class must implement the addToCommandline method.

    • Field Summary

      protected OptionSpec spec
      The OptionSpec describing the names that this ConfigVariable should match.

      • matches

        public boolean matches(String option)
        Returns the result of calling matches() on DEFAULT_SCRIPT_LIMITS with option as the argument.
        Returns:
        true of option matches DEFAULT_SCRIPT_LIMITS, and false otherwise.
